maintainer.name: Gentoo network monitoring and analysis project

use.flag: Add support for GeoIP2 through dev-libs/libmaxminddb
Add support for JSON through dev-libs/jansson
Add support for Apache Kafka through dev-libs/librdkafka
Add support for NFLOG through uacctd
Add support for RabbitMQ through net-libs/rabbitmq-c
Enable support for ULOG in older kernels (deprecated)
